concept.title: SSL Client/Server Communication
concept.shortdesc: This section describes the steps required to implement SSL-based communication between your clients and servers. It also provides information about how to configure your environment to run OpenSSL, where to download the OpenSSL source files, and how to build or install OpenSSL.

conbody.p: This chapter describes the security framework for the vFabric GemFire native client, and explains its authentication and authorization processes with the GemFire distributed system.

The open-source OpenSSL toolkit provides a full-strength general purpose cryptography library to operate along with the PKCS sample implementation for encrypted authentication of native client credentials.

p.i: If you use Cygwin, it is recommended that you do not use the OpenSSL library that comes with Cygwin because it is built with cygwin.dll as a dependency.
